Te Puke kiwifruit worker for Trevelyan’s loses lower leg after being hit by forklift https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/te-puke-kiwifruit-worker-for-trevelyans-loses-lower-leg-after-being-hit-by-forklift/ RJRYZUIOSBE5PED75UOLOAT6ZI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/te-puke-kiwifruit-worker-for-trevelyans-loses-lower-leg-after-being-hit-by-forklift/ RJRYZUIOSBE5PED75UOLOAT6ZI/ Megan Wilson'Everyday tasks like dressing, showering, and walking have become challenging.'
